The video was published on Facebook on J: 2019, and has been viewed over 1.4 million times and shared over 28,000 times.
The claim was made in a Spanish language: which translates to English as: "In Dubai last week the temperature reached 63 degrees celsius. That’s the highest temperature ever recorded worldwide. Trees started burning on their own. It’s forecast that by mid-July it could rise to 68 degrees. Climate change is already here."
